meanings.sent1: I love looking at pics of cute animals.
meanings.sent2: She keeps all her family pics in a special album.
meanings.sent3: The pics of the funny dog made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The pics of the sunset were like colorful paintings in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pics from the vacation were so clear, it felt like I was there again.

meanings.sent1: He took some amazing pics at the beach yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The old pics in the album brought back memories.
meanings.sent3: The pics of the birthday party captured all the fun moments.
meanings.sent4: Her pics were like windows to the past, frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The pics of the city skyline at night were breathtakingly beautiful.
